text:
January 28, 195$
Mr. M. S. Novik
300 W. 23rd Street
Mew York 11, N.T.
Dear Marries
Thanks for the editorial which I am
returning. I doubt if you would have enjoyed the
clipping so much if the similar situation would
have happened to Harry or Adlai.
Thanks also for the previous note.
I appreciated having the opportunity of
visiting with the Hoviks in their home. I am sorry
we caused you to lose sleep.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
President
